mapper.sql: SELECT id "id" , username "username" , password "password" , email "email" , point "point" , nickname "nickname" , name "name" , provider "provider" , providerId "providerId" FROM member WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(username, password, email, point, nickname, name, provider, providerId) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, COALESCE(#{point}, 0), #{nickname}, #{name}, #{provider}, #{providerId})
mapper.delete: DELETE m, ma, pi, f, mm, mr, mt, wl, umts FROM member m LEFT JOIN member_authorities ma ON m.id = ma.member_id LEFT JOIN profile_img pi ON m.id = pi.member_id LEFT JOIN friend f ON m.id = f.sender_id OR m.id = f.receiver_id LEFT JOIN my_matzip mm ON m.id = mm.member_id LEFT JOIN my_review mr ON m.id = mr.member_id LEFT JOIN matzip_tag mt ON mm.id = mt.my_matzip_id LEFT JOIN wish_list wl ON m.id = wl.member_id LEFT JOIN user_matzip_tag_status umts ON m.id = umts.member_id WHERE m.id =#{id}
